   21: %%
   22: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %%% File    : mnesia_evil_backup.erl
   24: %%% Author  : Dan Gudmundsson <dgud@legolas>
   25: %%% Purpose : Evil backup tests
   26: %%% Created : 3 Jun 1998 by Dan Gudmundsson <dgud@erix.ericsson.se>
   27: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: 
   29: -module(mnesia_evil_backup).
   30: -author('dgud@erix.ericsson.se').
   31: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   32: 
   33: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   34:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   35:          all/0, groups/0]).
   36: 
   37: -export([backup/1, bad_backup/1, global_backup_checkpoint/1,
   38:          traverse_backup/1,
   39:          selective_backup_checkpoint/1,
   40:          incremental_backup_checkpoint/1, install_fallback/1,
   41:          uninstall_fallback/1, local_fallback/1,
   42:          sops_with_checkpoint/1,
   43:          restore_errors/1, restore_clear/1, restore_keep/1,
   44:          restore_recreate/1, restore_clear_ram/1,
   45:          restore_recreate_empty/1
   46:         ]).
   47: 
   48: -export([check_tab/2]).
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   51:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   54:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   55: 
   56: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   57: 
   58: all() -> 
   59:     [backup, bad_backup, global_backup_checkpoint,
   60:      {group, restore_tables}, traverse_backup,
   61:      selective_backup_checkpoint,
   62:      incremental_backup_checkpoint, install_fallback,
   63:      uninstall_fallback, local_fallback,
   64:      sops_with_checkpoint].
   65: 
   66: groups() -> 
   67:     [{restore_tables, [],
   68:       [restore_errors, restore_clear, restore_keep,
   69:        restore_recreate, restore_clear_ram, restore_recreate_empty]}].
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: 
   78: backup(doc) -> ["Checking the interface to the function backup",
   79:                 "We don't check that the backups can be used here",
   80:                 "That is checked in install_fallback and in restore"];
   81: backup(suite) -> [];
   82: backup(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
   83:     [Node1, Node2] = _Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
   84:     Tab = backup_tab,
   85:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
   86:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),  
   87:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
   88:     File = "backup_test.BUP",
   89:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
   90: 
   91:     File2 = "backup_test2.BUP",
   92:     Tab2 = backup_tab2,
   93:     Def2 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node2]}],
   94:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),  
   95:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File2, mnesia_backup)),
   96: 
   97:     File3 = "backup_test3.BUP",
   98:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
   99:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:backup(File3, mnesia_backup)),
  100: 
  101:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  102:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  103:     ?match({error, _}, file:delete(File3)),
  104:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
  105: 
  106: 
  107: bad_backup(suite) -> [];
  108: bad_backup(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  109:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  110:     Tab = backup_tab,
  111:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}],
  112:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  113:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
  114:     File = "backup_test.BUP",
  115:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
  116:     file:write_file(File, "trash", [append]),
  117:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_bad})),
  118:     ?match({atomic,[Tab]}, mnesia:restore(File, [{clear_tables, [Tab]}])),
  119:     ?match([{Tab,1,test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  120:     
  121:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  122:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  123: 
  124: 
  125: 
  126: global_backup_checkpoint(doc) -> 
  127:     ["Checking the interface to the function backup_checkpoint",
  128:      "We don't check that the backups can be used here",
  129:      "That is checked in install_fallback and in restore"];
  130: global_backup_checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  131: global_backup_checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),    
  133:     Tab = backup_cp,
  134:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
  135:     File = "backup_checkpoint.BUP",
  136:     File2 = "backup_checkpoint2.BUP",
  137:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),    
  138:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
  139:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp_name, File)),
  140:     Spec = [{name, cp_name}, {max,  mnesia:system_info(tables)}],
  141:     ?match({ok, _Name, _Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(Spec)),
  142:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp_name, File)),
  143:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp_name_nonexist, File)),
  144:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp_name, File2, mnesia_backup)),
  145:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  146:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  147:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  148: 
  149: 
  150: restore_errors(suite) -> [];
  151: restore_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     [_Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  153:     ?match({aborted, enoent}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [])),
  154:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, not_a_list)),
  155:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [test_badarg])),
  156:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [{test_badarg, xxx}])),
  157:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [{skip_tables, xxx}])),
  158:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [{recreate_tables, [schema]}])),
  159:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, _}}, mnesia:restore(notAfile, [{default_op, asdklasd}])),
  160:     MnesiaDir = mnesia_lib:dir(),
  161:     ?match({aborted, {not_a_log_file, _}}, mnesia:restore(filename:join(MnesiaDir, "schema.DAT"), [])),
  162:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:restore(filename:join(MnesiaDir, "LATEST.LOG"), [])),
  163:     ok.
  164: 
  165: restore_clear(suite) -> [];
  166: restore_clear(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     restore(Config, clear_tables).
  168: 
  169: restore_keep(suite) -> [];
  170: restore_keep(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  171:     restore(Config, keep_tables).
  172: 
  173: restore_recreate(suite) -> [];
  174: restore_recreate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     restore(Config, recreate_tables).
  176: 
  177: check_tab(Records, Line) ->
  178:     Verify = fun({Table, Key, Val}) -> 
  179: 		     case catch mnesia:dirty_read({Table, Key}) of
  180: 			 [{Table, Key, Val}] -> ok;
  181: 			 Else ->
  182: 			     mnesia_test_lib:error("Not matching on Node ~p ~n"
  183: 						   " Expected ~p~n Actual  ~p~n", 
  184: 						   [node(), {Table, Key, Val}, Else],
  185: 						   ?MODULE, Line),
  186: 			     exit(error)     
  187: 		     end;
  188: 		(Recs) ->
  189: 		     [{Tab, Key, _}, _] = Recs,
  190: 		     SRecs = lists:sort(Recs),
  191: 		     R_Recs = lists:sort(catch mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, Key})),
  192: 		     case R_Recs of
  193: 			 SRecs -> ok;
  194: 			 Else ->
  195: 			     mnesia_test_lib:error("Not matching on Node ~p ~n"
  196: 						   " Expected ~p~n Actual  ~p~n", 
  197: 						   [node(), SRecs, Else],
  198: 						   ?MODULE, Line),
  199: 			     exit(error)
  200: 		     end
  201: 	     end,
  202:     lists:foreach(Verify, Records).
  203: 
  204: restore(Config, Op)  ->
  205:     [Node1, Node2, _Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  206:     
  207:     Tab1 = ram_snmp,
  208:     Def1 = [{snmp, [{key, integer}]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  209:     Tab2 = disc_index,
  210:     Def2 = [{index, [val]}, {disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
  211:     Tab3 = dionly_bag,
  212:     Def3 = [{type, bag}, {disc_only_copies, Nodes}],
  213:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
  214:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
  215:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
  216: 
  217:     File1 = "restore1.BUP",
  218:     File2 = "restore2.BUP",    
  219: 
  220:     Restore = fun(O, A) ->
  221: 		      case mnesia:restore(O, A) of
  222: 			  {atomic, Tabs} when is_list(Tabs) -> {atomic, lists:sort(Tabs)};
  223: 			  Other -> Other
  224: 		      end
  225: 	      end,
  226:     Tabs = lists:sort([Tab1, Tab2, Tab3]),
  227:     
  228:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, N, N+42}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  229:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, N, N+43}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  230:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab3, N, N+44}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  231:     
  232:     Res1 = [{Tab1, N, N+42} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  233:     Res2 = [{Tab2, N, N+43} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  234:     Res3 = [{Tab3, N, N+44} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  235:     
  236:     {ok, Name, _} = mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, Tabs}, {ram_overrides_dump, true}]),
  237:     file:delete(File1),
  238:     
  239:     %% Test standard Restore on one table on one node
  240:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(Name, File1)),
  241:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(Name)),
  242:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File2)),
  243:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  244:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  245:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab3, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  246: 
  247:     Res21 = [{Tab2, N, N+1} || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  248:     Res31 = [[{Tab3, N, N+1}, {Tab3, N, N+44}] || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  249:     Check = fun() ->
  250: 		    [disk_log:pid2name(X) ||
  251: 			X <- processes(), Data <- [process_info(X, [current_function])],
  252: 			Data =/= undefined,
  253: 			element(1, element(2, lists:keyfind(current_function, 1, Data)))=:= disk_log]
  254: 	    end,
  255:     Before = Check(),
  256:     ?match({atomic, [Tab1]}, Restore(File1, [{Op, [Tab1]},
  257: 					     {skip_tables, Tabs -- [Tab1]}])),    
  258:     case Op of 
  259: 	keep_tables -> 
  260: 	    ?match([{Tab1, 11, 12}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11}));
  261: 	clear_tables ->
  262: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11}));
  263: 	recreate_tables ->
  264: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11}))
  265:     end,
  266:     [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res1, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  267:     [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res21, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  268:     [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res31, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  269: 
  270:     %% Restore all tables on it's nodes
  271:     mnesia:clear_table(Tab1),
  272:     mnesia:clear_table(Tab2),
  273:     mnesia:clear_table(Tab3),
  274:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  275:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  276:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab3, N, N+1}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 11)],
  277: 
  278:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab2, Node1)),
  279: 
  280:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1})),
  281:     
  282:     ?match({atomic, Tabs}, Restore(File1, [{default_op, Op},
  283: 					   {module, mnesia_backup}])),
  284:     case Op of 
  285: 	clear_tables ->
  286: 	    ?match_receive({mnesia_table_event, {delete, {schema, Tab1}, _}}),
  287: 	    ?match_receive({mnesia_table_event, {write, {schema, Tab1, _}, _}}),
  288: 	    check_subscr(Tab1),
  289: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res1, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  290: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res2, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  291: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res3, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],	  
  292: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11})),
  293: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab2, 11})),
  294: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 11})),
  295: 	    %% Check Index
  296: 	    ?match([{Tab2, 10, 53}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 53, val)),
  297: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 11, val)),
  298: 	    %% Check Snmp
  299: 	    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
  300: 	    ?match({ok, {Tab1, 1, 43}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [1])),
  301: 	    ?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [11])),
  302: 	    %% Check schema info
  303: 	    ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, where_to_write));
  304: 	keep_tables -> 
  305: 	    check_subscr(Tab1),
  306: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res1, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  307: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res2, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  308: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res31, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],	    
  309: 	    ?match([{Tab1, 11, 12}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11})),
  310: 	    ?match([{Tab2, 11, 12}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab2, 11})),
  311: 	    ?match([{Tab3, 11, 12}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 11})),
  312: 	    ?match([{Tab2, 10, 53}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 53, val)),
  313: 	    %% Check Index
  314: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 11, val)),
  315: 	    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
  316: 	    %% Check Snmp
  317: 	    ?match({ok, {Tab1, 1, 43}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [1])),
  318: 	    ?match({ok, {Tab1, 11, 12}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [11])),
  319: 	    %% Check schema info
  320: 	    ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, where_to_write));
  321: 	recreate_tables ->
  322: 	    check_subscr(Tab1, 0),
  323: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res1, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  324: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res2, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],
  325: 	    [rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, check_tab, [Res3, ?LINE]) || Node <- Nodes],	
  326: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 11})),
  327: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab2, 11})),
  328: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 11})),
  329: 	    %% Check Index
  330: 	    ?match([{Tab2, 10, 53}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 53, val)),  	   	    
  331: 	    ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, 11, val)),
  332: 	    %% Check Snmp
  333: 	    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
  334: 	    ?match({ok, {Tab1, 1, 43}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [1])),
  335: 	    ?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [11])),
  336: 	    %% Check schema info
  337: 	    Ns = lists:sort([Node1, Node2]),
  338: 	    ?match(Ns, lists:sort(mnesia:table_info(Tab2, where_to_write)))	    
  339:     end,
  340:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File1)),
  341:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  342:     ?match([], Check() -- (Before ++ [{ok, latest_log}, {ok, previous_log}])),
  343: 
  344:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  345: 
  346: 
  347: check_subscr(Tab) ->    
  348:     check_subscr(Tab, 10).
  349: 
  350: check_subscr(_Tab, 0) ->    
  351:     receive 
  352: 	Msg ->
  353: 	    ?error("Too many msgs ~p~n", [Msg])
  354:     after 500 ->
  355: 	    ok
  356:     end;
  357: check_subscr(Tab, N) ->
  358:     V = N +42,
  359:     receive
  360: 	{mnesia_table_event, {write, {Tab, N, V}, _}} ->
  361: 	    check_subscr(Tab, N-1)
  362:     after 500 ->
  363: 	    ?error("Missing ~p~n", [{Tab, N, V}])
  364:     end.
  365: 
  366: restore_clear_ram(suite) -> [];
  367: restore_clear_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  368:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, [{diskless, true}|Config]),
  369:     
  370:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  371:     
  372:     Write = fun(What) ->
  373: 		    mnesia:write({a,1,What}),
  374: 		    mnesia:write({a,2,What}),
  375: 		    mnesia:write({a,3,What})
  376: 	    end,
  377:     Bup = "restore_clear_ram.BUP",
  378: 
  379:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [initial])),
  380:     ?match({ok, _, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name,test}, 
  381: 						   {min, [schema, a]},
  382: 						   {ram_overrides_dump, true}])),
  383:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(test, Bup)),
  384:     
  385:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [data])),
  386:     ?match({atomic, [a]}, mnesia:restore(Bup, [{clear_tables,[a]},{default_op,skip_tables}])),
  387: 
  388:     restore_clear_ram_loop(100, Nodes, Bup),
  389:     
  390:     ok.
  391:     
  392: restore_clear_ram_loop(N, Nodes = [N1,N2,N3], Bup) when N > 0 ->
  393:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
  394:     ?match({_, []}, rpc:multicall([N1,N2], mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, Nodes}]])),
  395:     Key = rpc:async_call(N3, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, Nodes}]]),
  396:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  397:     ?match({atomic, [a]}, mnesia:restore(Bup, [{clear_tables,[a]},{default_op,skip_tables}])),
  398:     ?match(ok, rpc:yield(Key)),
  399:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[a], 3000])),
  400:     case rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [a,size]) of
  401: 	{[3,3,3], []} ->
  402: 	    restore_clear_ram_loop(N-1, Nodes, Bup);
  403: 	Error ->
  404: 	    ?match(3, Error)
  405:     end;
  406: restore_clear_ram_loop(_,_,_) ->
  407:     ok.
  408: 
  409: restore_recreate_empty(doc) ->
  410:     ["Test recreation from empty schema"];
  411: restore_recreate_empty(suite) -> [];
  412: restore_recreate_empty(Config) ->
  413:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  414: 
  415:     Tab1 = ram_snmp,
  416:     Def1 = [{snmp, [{key, integer}]}, {ram_copies, Nodes}],
  417:     Tab2 = disc_index,
  418:     Def2 = [{type, bag}, {index, [val]}, {disc_copies, Nodes}],
  419:     Tab3 = dionly,
  420:     Def3 = [{index, [val]}, {disc_only_copies, Nodes}],
  421:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
  422:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
  423:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
  424: 
  425:     Res1 = [{Tab1, N, N+42} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  426:     Res2 = [{Tab2, N, N+43} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  427:     Res3 = [{Tab3, N, N+44} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  428: 
  429:     [mnesia:dirty_write(W) || TabW <- [Res1, Res2, Res3], W <- TabW],
  430: 
  431:     File1 = "recreate.bup",
  432:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File1)),
  433: 
  434:     mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, 12, 12+42}),
  435:     mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, 12, 12+43}),
  436:     mnesia:dirty_write({Tab3, 12, 12+44}),
  437: 
  438:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
  439:     ok = mnesia:delete_schema(Nodes),
  440:     ok = mnesia:start(),
  441: 
  442:     ?match({atomic, _Tabs}, mnesia:restore(File1, [{default_op, recreate_tables}])),
  443: 
  444:     check_tab(Res2, ?LINE),
  445:     check_tab(Res3, ?LINE),
  446: 
  447:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab1, 12})),
  448:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab2, 12})),
  449:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 12})),
  450: 
  451:     [?match([{Tab2, N, _}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab2, N+43, val)) || N <- lists:seq(1,10)],
  452:     [?match([{Tab3, N, _}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab3, N+44, val)) || N <- lists:seq(1,10)],
  453: 
  454:     ok.
  455: 
  456: 
  457: traverse_backup(doc) -> 
  458:     ["Testing the traverse_backup interface, the resulting file is not tested though",
  459:      "See install_fallback for result using the output file from traverse_backup",
  460:      "A side effect is that the backup file contents are tested"];
  461: traverse_backup(suite) -> [];
  462: traverse_backup(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  463:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  464:     Tab = backup_tab,
  465:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
  466:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),  
  467:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_nok})),
  468:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, test_nok})),
  469:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, test_nok})),
  470:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 4, test_nok})),
  471:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 5, test_nok})),
  472:     File = "_treverse_backup.BUP",
  473:     File2 = "traverse_backup2.BUP",
  474:     File3 = "traverse_backup3.BUP",
  475:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
  476:             
  477:     Fun = fun({backup_tab, N, _}, Acc) -> {[{backup_tab, N, test_ok}], Acc+1};
  478:              (Other, Acc) -> {[Other], Acc}
  479:           end,
  480: 
  481:     ?match({ok, 5}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, read_only, Fun, 0)),
  482:     ?match(ok, file:delete(read_only)),
  483:     
  484:     ?match({ok, 5}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, mnesia_backup, 
  485:                                            dummy, read_only, Fun, 0)),
  486: 
  487:     ?match({ok, 5}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, File2, Fun, 0)),    
  488:     ?match({ok, 5}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File2, mnesia_backup, 
  489:                                            File3, mnesia_backup, Fun, 0)),
  490:     
  491:     BadFun = fun({bad_tab, _N, asd}, Acc) -> {{error, error}, Acc} end,    
  492:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, read_only, BadFun, 0)),    
  493:     ?match({error, _}, file:delete(read_only)),
  494:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  495:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  496:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File3)),
  497:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  498: 
  499: 
  500: install_fallback(doc) -> 
  501:     ["This tests the install_fallback intf.",
  502:      "It also verifies that the output from backup_checkpoint and traverse_backup",
  503:      "is valid"];
  504: install_fallback(suite) -> [];
  505: install_fallback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  506:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  507:     Tab = fallbacks_test,
  508:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
  509:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),  
  510:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_nok})),
  511:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, test_nok})),
  512:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, test_nok})),
  513:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 4, test_nok})),
  514:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 5, test_nok})),
  515: 
  516:     Tab2 = fallbacks_test2,
  517:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [node()]}],
  518:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),  
  519:     Tab3 = fallbacks_test3,
  520:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def2)),  
  521:     Fun2 = fun(Key) ->
  522: 		  Rec = {Tab2, Key, test_ok},
  523: 		  mnesia:dirty_write(Rec),
  524: 		  [Rec]
  525: 	  end,
  526:     TabSize3 = 1000,
  527:     OldRecs2 = [Fun2(K) || K <- lists:seq(1, TabSize3)],
  528:     
  529:     Spec =[{name, cp_name}, {max,  mnesia:system_info(tables)}],
  530:     ?match({ok, _Name, Nodes}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(Spec)),
  531:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 6, test_nok})),
  532:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, K, test_nok}) || K <- lists:seq(1, TabSize3 + 10)],
  533:     File = "install_fallback.BUP",
  534:     File2 = "install_fallback2.BUP",
  535:     File3 = "install_fallback3.BUP",
  536:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp_name, File)),
  537:         
  538:     Fun = fun({T, N, _}, Acc) when T == Tab ->
  539: 		  case N rem 2 of 
  540: 		      0 -> 
  541: 			  io:format("write ~p -> ~p~n", [N, T]),
  542: 			  {[{T, N, test_ok}], Acc + 1};
  543: 		      1 ->
  544: 			  io:format("write ~p -> ~p~n", [N, Tab3]),
  545: 			  {[{Tab3, N, test_ok}], Acc + 1}
  546: 		  end;
  547:              ({T, N}, Acc) when T == Tab ->
  548: 		  case N rem 2 of 
  549: 		      0 -> 
  550: 			  io:format("delete ~p -> ~p~n", [N, T]),
  551: 			  {[{T, N}], Acc + 1};
  552: 		      1 ->
  553: 			  io:format("delete ~p -> ~p~n", [N, Tab3]),
  554: 			  {[{Tab3, N}], Acc + 1}
  555: 		  end;
  556:              (Other, Acc) ->
  557: 		  {[Other], Acc}
  558:           end,
  559:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, File2, Fun, 0)),
  560:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File2)),
  561:     
  562:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1, Node2]),
  563:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), % Let it die!
  564: 
  565:     ok = mnesia:start([{ignore_fallback_at_startup, true}]),
  566:     ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab, Tab2, Tab3], 10000),
  567:     ?match([{Tab, 6, test_nok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 6})),
  568:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  569:     application:set_env(mnesia, ignore_fallback_at_startup, false),
  570: 
  571:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), % Let it die!
  572: 
  573:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1, Node2], [Tab, Tab2, Tab3])),
  574: 
  575:     % Verify 
  576:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
  577:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 1})),
  578:     ?match([{Tab, 2, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 2})),
  579:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 2})),
  580:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 3})),
  581:     ?match([{Tab3, 3, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 3})),
  582:     ?match([{Tab, 4, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 4})),
  583:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 4})),
  584:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 5})),   
  585:     ?match([{Tab3, 5, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 5})),   
  586:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 6})),   
  587:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab3, 6})),   
  588:     ?match([], [mnesia:dirty_read({Tab2, K}) || K <- lists:seq(1, TabSize3)] -- OldRecs2),
  589:     ?match(TabSize3, mnesia:table_info(Tab2, size)),
  590: 
  591:     % Check the interface
  592:     file:delete(File3),
  593:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback(File3)),
  594:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback(File2, mnesia_badmod)),
  595:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback(File2, {foo, foo})),
  596:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback(File2, [{foo, foo}])),
  597:     ?match({error, {badarg, {skip_tables, _}}},
  598: 	   mnesia:install_fallback(File2, [{default_op, skip_tables},
  599: 					   {default_op, keep_tables},
  600: 					   {keep_tables, [Tab, Tab2, Tab3]},
  601: 					   {skip_tables, [foo,{asd}]}])),
  602:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File2, mnesia_backup)),
  603:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  604:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  605:     ?match({error, _}, file:delete(File3)),
  606:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  607: 
  608: uninstall_fallback(suite) -> [];
  609: uninstall_fallback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  610:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  611:     Tab = uinst_fallbacks_test,
  612:     File = "uinst_fallback.BUP",
  613:     File2 = "uinst_fallback2.BUP",
  614:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
  615:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),  
  616:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
  617:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
  618:     Fun = fun({T, N, _}, Acc) when T == Tab -> 
  619:                   {[{T, N, test_nok}], Acc+1};
  620:              (Other, Acc) -> {[Other], Acc}
  621:           end,
  622:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:traverse_backup(File, File2, Fun, 0)),
  623:     ?match({error, enoent}, mnesia:uninstall_fallback()),
  624:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File2)),
  625:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  626:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  627:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:uninstall_fallback([foobar])),
  628:     ?match(ok, mnesia:uninstall_fallback()),
  629:     
  630:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1, Node2]),
  631:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), % Let it die!
  632:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1, Node2], [Tab])),
  633:     ?match([{Tab, 1, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
  634:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  635: 
  636: local_fallback(suite) -> [];
  637: local_fallback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  638:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  639:     Tab = local_fallback,
  640:     File = "local_fallback.BUP",
  641:     Def = [{disc_copies, Nodes}],
  642:     Key = foo,
  643:     Pre =  {Tab, Key, pre},
  644:     Post =  {Tab, Key, post},
  645:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),  
  646:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Pre)),
  647:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
  648:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Post)),
  649:     Local = [{scope, local}],
  650:     ?match({error, enoent}, mnesia:uninstall_fallback(Local)),
  651:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File, Local)),
  652:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(fallback_activated)),
  653:     ?match(ok, mnesia:uninstall_fallback(Local)),
  654:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(fallback_activated)),
  655:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File, Local)),
  656:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(fallback_activated)),
  657:     
  658:     ?match(false, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info , [fallback_activated])),
  659:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, install_fallback , [File, Local])),
  660:     ?match([Post], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, Key})),
  661:     ?match([Post], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, Key}])),
  662: 
  663:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes)),
  664:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab])),
  665:     ?match([Pre], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, Key})),
  666:     ?match([Pre], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, Key}])),
  667:     Dir = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info , [directory]),
  668: 
  669:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Post)),
  670:     ?match([Post], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, Key})),
  671:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2])),
  672:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File, Local ++ [{mnesia_dir, Dir}])),
  673:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1])),
  674:     
  675:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2], [])),
  676:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
  677:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab])), 
  678:     ?match([Pre], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, Key})),
  679:    
  680:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),  
  681:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  682:     
  683: selective_backup_checkpoint(doc) -> 
  684:     ["Perform a selective backup of a checkpoint"];
  685: selective_backup_checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  686: selective_backup_checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  687:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),    
  688:     Tab = sel_backup,
  689:     OmitTab = sel_backup_omit,
  690:     CpName = sel_cp,
  691:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
  692:     File = "selective_backup_checkpoint.BUP",
  693:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),    
  694:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(OmitTab, Def)),    
  695:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
  696:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({OmitTab, 1, test_ok})),
  697:     CpSpec = [{name, CpName}, {max,  mnesia:system_info(tables)}],
  698:     ?match({ok, CpName, _Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(CpSpec)),
  699: 
  700:     BupSpec = [{tables, [Tab]}],
  701:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CpName, File, BupSpec)),
  702: 
  703:     ?match([schema, sel_backup], bup_tables(File, mnesia_backup)),
  704:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  705: 
  706:     BupSpec2 = [{tables, [Tab, OmitTab]}],
  707:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CpName, File, BupSpec2)),
  708: 
  709:     ?match([schema, sel_backup, sel_backup_omit],
  710: 	   bup_tables(File, mnesia_backup)),
  711:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  712:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  713: 
  714: bup_tables(File, Mod) ->
  715:     Fun = fun(Rec, Tabs) ->
  716: 		  Tab = element(1, Rec),
  717: 		  Tabs2 = [Tab | lists:delete(Tab, Tabs)],
  718: 		  {[Rec], Tabs2}
  719: 	  end,
  720:     case mnesia:traverse_backup(File, Mod, dummy, read_only, Fun, []) of
  721: 	{ok, Tabs} ->
  722: 	    lists:sort(Tabs);
  723: 	{error, Reason} ->
  724: 	    exit(Reason)
  725:     end.
  726: 
  727: incremental_backup_checkpoint(doc) -> 
  728:     ["Perform a incremental backup of a checkpoint"];
  729: incremental_backup_checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  730: incremental_backup_checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  731:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),    
  732:     Tab = incr_backup,
  733:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}],
  734:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  735:     OldRecs = [{Tab, K, -K} || K <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  736:     ?match([ok|_], [mnesia:dirty_write(R) || R <- OldRecs]),
  737:     OldCpName = old_cp,
  738:     OldCpSpec = [{name, OldCpName}, {min,  [Tab]}],
  739:     ?match({ok, OldCpName, _Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(OldCpSpec)),
  740: 
  741:     BupSpec = [{tables, [Tab]}],
  742:     OldFile = "old_full_backup.BUP",
  743:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(OldCpName, OldFile, BupSpec)),
  744:     ?match(OldRecs, bup_records(OldFile, mnesia_backup)),
  745:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab, 1})),
  746:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 2})),
  747:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, -3})),
  748: 
  749:     NewCpName = new_cp,
  750:     NewCpSpec = [{name, NewCpName}, {min,  [Tab]}],
  751:     ?match({ok, NewCpName, _Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(NewCpSpec)),
  752:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 4, 4})),
  753: 
  754:     NewFile = "new_full_backup.BUP",
  755:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(NewCpName, NewFile, BupSpec)),
  756:     NewRecs = [{Tab, 2, 2}, {Tab, 3, -3},
  757: 	       {Tab, 4, 4}, {Tab, 4}, {Tab, 4, -4}, {Tab, 5, -5}],
  758:     ?match(NewRecs, bup_records(NewFile, mnesia_backup)),
  759: 
  760:     DiffFile = "diff_backup.BUP",
  761:     DiffBupSpec = [{tables, [Tab]}, {incremental, OldCpName}],
  762:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(NewCpName, DiffFile, DiffBupSpec)),
  763:     DiffRecs = [{Tab, 1}, {Tab, 2}, {Tab, 2, 2}, {Tab, 3}, {Tab, 3, -3},
  764: 		{Tab, 4}, {Tab, 4, 4}, {Tab, 4}, {Tab, 4, -4}],
  765:     ?match(DiffRecs, bup_records(DiffFile, mnesia_backup)),
  766: 
  767:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(OldCpName)),
  768:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(NewCpName)),
  769:     ?match(ok, file:delete(OldFile)),
  770:     ?match(ok, file:delete(NewFile)),
  771:     ?match(ok, file:delete(DiffFile)),
  772: 
  773:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  774: 
  775: bup_records(File, Mod) ->
  776:     Fun = fun(Rec, Recs) when element(1, Rec) == schema ->
  777: 		  {[Rec], Recs};
  778: 	     (Rec, Recs) ->
  779: 		  {[Rec], [Rec | Recs]}
  780: 	  end,
  781:     case mnesia:traverse_backup(File, Mod, dummy, read_only, Fun, []) of
  782: 	{ok, Recs} ->
  783: 	    lists:keysort(1, lists:keysort(2, lists:reverse(Recs)));
  784: 	{error, Reason} ->
  785: 	    exit(Reason)
  786:     end.
  787: 
  788: sops_with_checkpoint(doc) ->
  789:     ["Test schema operations during a checkpoint"];
  790: sops_with_checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  791: sops_with_checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  792:     Ns = [N1,N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  793: 
  794:     ?match({ok, cp1, Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, cp1},{max,mnesia:system_info(tables)}])),
  795:     Tab = tab,
  796:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies,Ns}])),
  797:     OldRecs = [{Tab, K, -K} || K <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
  798:     [mnesia:dirty_write(R) || R <- OldRecs],
  799: 
  800:     ?match({ok, cp2, Ns}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, cp2},{max,mnesia:system_info(tables)}])),
  801:     File1 = "cp1_delete_me.BUP",
  802:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab,6,-6})),
  803:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp1, File1)),
  804:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab,7,-7})),
  805:     File2 = "cp2_delete_me.BUP",
  806:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp2, File2)),
  807: 
  808:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(cp1)),
  809:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp2, File1)),
  810:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab,8,-8})),
  811: 
  812:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
  813:     ?match(true, filelib:is_file(File2)),
  814:     ?match({error,_}, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp2, File2)),
  815:     ?match(true, filelib:is_file(File2)),
  816: 
  817:     ?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab,9,-9})),
  818: 
  819:     ?match({atomic,_}, mnesia:restore(File1, [{default_op, recreate_tables}])),
  820:     Test = fun(N) when N > 5 -> ?error("To many records in backup ~p ~n", [N]);
  821: 	      (N) -> case mnesia:dirty_read(Tab,N) of
  822: 			 [{Tab,N,B}] when -B =:= N -> ok;
  823: 			 Other -> ?error("Not matching ~p ~p~n", [N,Other])
  824: 		     end
  825: 	   end,
  826:     [Test(N) || N <- mnesia:dirty_all_keys(Tab)],
  827:     ok = file:delete(File2),
  828:     ?match({aborted,enoent}, mnesia:restore(File2, [{default_op, recreate_tables}])),
  829: 
  830:     %% Mnesia crashes when deleting a table during backup
  831:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N2])),
  832:     Tab2 = ram,
  833:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies,[N1]}])),
  834:     ?match({ok, cp3, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, cp3},
  835:                                                      {ram_overrides_dump,true},
  836:                                                      {min,[Tab2]}])),
  837:     Write = fun Loop (N) ->
  838:                    case N > 0 of
  839:                        true ->
  840:                            mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, N+100, N+100}),
  841:                            Loop(N-1);
  842:                        false ->
  843:                            ok
  844:                    end
  845:            end,
  846:     ok = Write(100000),
  847:     spawn_link(fun() -> ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)) end),
  848: 
  849:     %% We don't check result here, depends on timing of above call
  850:     mnesia:backup_checkpoint(cp3, File2),
  851:     file:delete(File1), file:delete(File2),
  852: 
  853:     ?verify_mnesia([N1], [N2]).
